A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It was okay\, but definitely didn't pack the same type of renewed wonder and excitement that the previous entry provided.  The story felt slat\, uninspired and a bit of a let down in how it dealt with the return of Luke Skywalker.  There were certainly some interesting twist. but the plot left me with more questions than answers.  The hardcore Star Wars fans will undoubtedly still go out and see it\, but I think the casual fan would be better off waiting for the dvd.
